revised_title: Rutherford's Legacy in Radio and Opto-Electronics
tldr: This article discusses Rutherford's early work on radio and his contributions to the development of opto-electronics. It highlights his initial research in Canterbury College, Christchurch, and his later work in the Cavendish Laboratory, Cambridge. The paper also covers the development of television and the impact of Rutherford's discoveries on the field of science.
